pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4150 | AMD FX-4300 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX950 / GTX1050 with 2 GB VRAM | AMD Radeon R9 270 / R9 370 / RX460 with 2 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 90 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Mouse and Keyboard supported. Game contains EasyAntiCheat anti-cheat technology and Denuvo anti-tamper technology.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 | AMD Ryzen 5 1400 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX1080 with 3 GB VRAM or more | AMD Radeon RX580 with 4 GB VRAM or more
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 90 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Mouse and Keyboard supported. Game contains EasyAntiCheat anti-cheat technology and Denuvo anti-tamper technology.
